title: Southern Utah
description: An adventure I had touring between the national parks in southern Utah.

description: One of the things that has become popular here in Provo is longboarding! I've tried my hand at it a few times and found it quite enjoyable!

description: Just a few of the interesting things I found on and around BYU's campus.

description: In the summer of 2016 I went to quite a few different concerts. This is the compilation of pictures and features that I saw.

title: New Mexico
description: This year the APS (American Physical Society) four-corners section was held in Las Cruces, New Mexico. I was invited to present my research.

description: I spent the winter of 2016 in my hometown: Spokane.

description: This past summer was packed full of activities. Here's what I did during the start.

title: San Francisco
description: As part of a roadtrip, my friend and I stopped by San Francisco.

description: The final hurrah for the summer of 2017.

description: Early in the fall semester of 2017 I was invited by Microsoft to fly out and visit.

description: As part of my work in condensed matter physics, I was invited to present my research at the annual APS Four Corners section held in Fort Collins Colorado.

title: Fall Semester 2017
description: Even though I took 3 less credits than I normally do, I was still very busy this semester. I managed to have some fun though.

description: To start off the winter vacation of 2017, I went eagle-watching in Coeur d'Alene Idaho.

description: As part of winter break, I visited my sister in Vancouver and toured Portland.

description: I did a lot during the first half of this semester. This is just a few of the things I did.

description: I backpacked into the famous 'Coyote Gulch' with some friends.

title: The Bay Area
description: I was invited out to interview with a few companies in the bay area. While there I explored a lot of places.

title: Climbing in St. George
description: BYU gives us one day of spring break. To take advantage of it, I went climbing and skiing in St. George.
